content: Is there any automatic way to import archives of a gitter room into Zulip? That would help the switch a lot.
Not yet, though we have a mostly complete one for Slack. If there's a way to export from gitter to slack, might be worth trying a gitter -> slack -> zulip? @Patrick Massot
ok, thanks, I will investigate gitter -> slack
otherwise we could try to play with REST apis on both sides

the zulip import script is pretty good, so as long as you can get the gitter output into the correct form, importing into Zulip should be fine. @Rhea Parekh and @Steve Howell might have a sense as to which is better (using the API directly, or getting the gitter output into a form recognizable from the zulip import script).
When you write "zulip import script", do you mean https://github.com/zulip/zulip/blob/master/zerver/management/commands/import.py? Is this documented somewhere?
@Patrick Massot See http://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/subsystems/conversion.html?highlight=import
Ok, it's still an adventure. We will probably do something else then. Thanks to both of you!
